title: Best price for a Tie Dye Shirt? - Quora

response.answer_text: You need to figure out your costs before you set your pricing. I can't tell you what your costs are. You need to figure out your rent, the costs of the shirts, the costs of the dyes and the actual costs of producing each shirt ( including paying for things like rent and heat and electricity and the labor the dye each shirt) Do the math and then that will determine the costs of the shirts. Unless you have magical elves producing the shirts for you...the costs will be more than you think.

Instead of buying one, why not make one at home? And making a tie & dye fabric print shirt at home is not as tough as it sounds. It’s one of the best and easiest T-shirt decoration idea. Sharing 5 such prints that you can make by tieing the fabric in various patterns and dyeing it in vibrant colors. Check it out:  Hope these ideas help.

Before you set the price of any shirt .It include many thing the cost of the cloth which include dyes ,making cost ,man power ,rent .Including all this ,after that cost are decided.  http://embroidmemalaga.com.au
